results.name: Triangle read by rows, left border = natural numbers repeated (1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3,...); all other columns = (1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0,...).
comment: Row sums = n. Eigensequence of the triangle = nonzero terms of A000071: (1, 2, 4, 7, 12, 20,...) = ((F3 - 1), (F4 - 1), (F5 - 1),...)
formula: Triangle by rows, left border = natural numbers repeated (1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3,...); all other columns = (1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0,...).
